1.content: Eric drags his suitcase out of the car and slams the door shut, silencing the bickering of his parents. They were in the middle of a divorce, and while both his parents were usually happy rational people, they just didn't get along anymore. Eric completely understood this and knew that this was for the best, but their constant fighting and bickering was not making for a good environment. So while his parents finalized their paperwork and went through with their divorce, his uncle Geoff had kindly extended his home to Eric, as a place where he didn't have to withstand constant arguments. His parents, usually suspect and suspicious of anything Geoff did, eventually accepted, thinking it would be best for Eric not to be around. Eric was eager about the situation, he did have friends back at home he'd want to keep in touch with, but it wasn't as if his Uncle lived miles away. And this would give him a chance to meet the uncle he never knew. So Eric, with his packed bags waved off his families car, and walked toward the mansion with a growing sense of uncertainty. Reaching the door, after crossing quite a large courtyard, Eric rings the doorbell, only to be answered by,
1.title: Uncle Geoff's Mansion

choices: who is hugely fat, holds out a hand to shake...
who is huge and fat, takes Eric into a huge bear hug
who's fat but not huge, grins and says, "Follow me!"
who's tall, very muscular and quite fat, grabs Eric's bags....
his great gut wobbling, gestures to a golf cart.  "Get in!"
11.content:
Eric walked up to the big wooden doors and rang the doorbell, after a few moments, the door was opened by someone. Eric looked inside to see a man standing there.

"Uncle Geoff?" Eric says tentatively.

The man replies, "Yes I am! You must be Eric! Come on in!"

Eric, relaxing a little in the face of this enthusiatic welcome, steps inside, and Uncle Geoff,
11.title: Meeting Uncle Geoff

111.content:
The man standing before you is huge! Your uncle is a giant of man. His height is only a contributing factor, he must be 6'7, maybe 6'8; but the real effect to how big he is, is the size of his belly. His gut is a large round mound of flesh, hanging a few feet in front of him. His stance is wide, and body is thick. He's wearing a collared button up dress shirt that stretches out over his gut, and looks tight around the apex of it. His slacks look neat and tailored, but they have to be custom made. You don't know anywhere that would sell something close to this size.
He Greets you enthusiastically with a handshake, which you take, surprised by the crushing grip he has.
"Eric! It's been so long! Come on in." He says and lumbers to the side to allow you entrance. You step forward, getting your first view of the entrance to the enormous house. Inside there a huge opening, a grand hall would describe it. with two large staircases that lead up to a balcony second floor. there are multiple doors and hallways just in the entrance. It'll take you ages to figure out where everything is.
"Huge place you got." You say trying to ignore the imposing figure behind you.
"Oh yes, I made a fortune from working out of my labs. But I don't want to bore you, come on, I want to show you..."
111.title: who is hugely fat, holds out a hand to shake...

1111.content:
"Oh yes, I made a fortune from working out of my labs. But I don't want to bore you, come on, I want to show you your room" Uncle Geoffs says and begins to walk, or more precisly waddle towards the stairs.
"Your room is on the second floor with it's own balcony. Great view." he says.
Your just about to start walking up the stairs when your uncle turns left and motions for you to follow. He opens a door and you see that instead of a room it is a elevator inside. You carry your luggage inside and your uncle steps in. Your uncle is so large that he nearly fills the small room, theres barley room for you and your luggage next to him.
At the second floor your uncle gets out and you follow.
"I had the elevator installed a few years ago," he explains," I'm not as good at stairs as I used to be."
You find it hard to imagine that someone so huge has ever been good at stairs.

Your room turns out to be three rooms, a bedroom, a bathroom and a livingroom. And a large balcony. The bed is large and soft, it could probably hold 5 grown men and still have some spare room. It's even electric and can be elevated to a sitting position, facing a large TV on the wall.
"This is awesome," You say.
"glad you like it. I must leave you now, have to study something in the lab. I'll see you again for dinner at 6 pm in the dining room. If you don't find it ask one of the waiters, they should be around somewhere. If you need them just push the red button on the remote." He points to the bed and you notice a remote hanging in the air so you can just grab it when you wake up.
"With that I wont have to leave the bed at all." You say jokeingly.
"If you want, thats fine with me, you can do whatever you want, except going into my lab. It's dangerous stuff there." Then he leaves.

What do you do now?
1111.title: Your room

choices: stay in bed and do some gaming....
get up and explore the mansion - you're a bit restless, and curious...
11112.content:
"With that, I won't have to leave the bed at all," you say jokingly.

"If you want, that's fine with me; you can do whatever you want, except go into my lab. It's dangerous, the stuff in there," Uncle Geoff remarks. Then he turns and leaves, making his way surprisingly quickly for a man so huge.

You look around the room again, and get onto the bed. Using the remotes, you move the bed around, finally adjusting it so you can sit. You try out the stereo, then flip on the TV and cruise through the channels. You notice a controller by the bed, and turn on the Xbox. But, after going through the library of titles, you decide to...
11112.title: Eric takes a look around

choices: Make a character and play the game
Leave the room, the only games for him are sports
111121.content: Flipping through the titles in the games you find all your regular favorites. Halo, Dragon Age, Skyrim, anything a good gamer should own. But in the back, you see some titles you don't recognize. Some of them are action games, some of them are fighting games. All different types, but all of them have something that you notice and find a little funny. All the main characters are in some way shape and form, big. There's an RPG game that catches your eye. It claims that it lets you upload an image of yourself, that it can turn into a 3D model that you play as your character. In the demo footage, it shows a really thick chubby character exploring a cave, fending off witches, and other such fantasy pursuits. But in each subsequent shot of the same character, he looks fatter and fatter. The game is enticing, and Eric debates what he wants to do. He decides to,
111121.title: stay in bed and do some gaming....

choices: Investigate the overworld!  Monsters and dungeons await!
Check out the restaurant; your character's food bar is pretty low...
1111211.content:
"This looks like fun," you think. You start up a new game, and the game asks for a picture of yourself. You suddenly realize that you don't have a flash card or anything to submit to the game, but eventually you notice you don't have to; the RPG automatically downloads a good full-body picture of yourself from your phone.

That's weird, how did it know that was me? you wonder, but you shake the suspicion off as you watch your 2-dimensional figure get converted into a surprisingly high-res 3-dimensional model.

All right, you think. This is gonna be good!

You start out in a basic town carrying a few tools to start off: a sword, some light armor, and 50 gold. There are all kinds of buildings: a shop, a restaurant, and a path to what seems to be the starting overworld.

The game's graphics are brilliant; visually stunning, almost as if you're watching real life...

But unlike the screenshots, it looks like your character is average size; about the same as you, in fact!

Wonder where Uncle Geoff got an awesome game like this, you wonder. Itching your chin, you think to yourself what to do next. The restaurant does look interesting, but there's also an entire world of monsters and dungeons down the road as well!

What should you do?
1111211.title: Make a character and play the game

choices: Keep playing the game and figure out something on your own.
11112112.content:
If my food bar is low, who know what will happen when I go out there, you think. You're experienced enough to know whether or not to go out into action when your stats are low.

You go into the restaurant. It's surprisingly very well-made; the resolution is amazing, better than you've seen in Skyrim. You go up to the counter. There are a few patrons already sitting down, but you notice that many of them are overweight, and have large amounts of food in front of them.

"Hey, what can I get for you?" the bartender asks. A list of responses appears on the screen, prompting you to chose one, which you do.

"Can I get something to eat? I'm starved," your look-alike character says.

"No problem," replies the bartender. He turns back and calls to the kitchen. "One order of fried chicken on the house!"

"Hey, thanks," your character says.

"No problem," says the bartender. "I can tell you're new around these parts, so I got you a free order."

"Thanks," your character says.

"No problem. Go on and have a seat while we get you your food."

You sit your character down at a table. All of the tables are unusually large for some reason, but you pass it off as just a flaw in the game design or something.

Then the food comes in. There are tons of plates of fried chicken, roasted duck, pie, cake, and burgers galore. There are 4 or 5 large platters stacked with the food, and you know for a fact that if this were real life, you wouldn't be able to eat nearly this much.

Is this a flaw in the game too? you wonder.

The bartender and the cook set all of the food down in front of you, covering the entirety of the large table that you're sitting on. Although you would have left this feast normally, your food bar is still very low, so you stay anyway.

"Dig in!" they say.

Once you enter the command to begin eating, your character digs into the food ravenously, swallowing slice after slice of blueberry pie. As it happens, you could swear that you feel the taste of blueberries in your mouth and the sensation of food going down your throat and into your stomach. You try to stop the feeding, but you can't stop now that you've started. Your character, against your own wishes, is stuffing his face full of more food than you could possibly ever handle. You look down and your own belly and see that it's strangely filling up with something.

Your character and yourself are connected, you suddenly realize.

You frequently try pressing buttons, but it does nothing as your character continues to feast and feast, his own belly swelling with yours. You can do nothing but watch as your character swallows the rest of the feast, bigger than you could possibly eat normally. By the time he's done, his belly hangs out 2 feet from the rest of him, the size of a beach ball.

And so is your own.

You try to turn off the game, but you can't for whatever reason. You also can't leave the room, as some invisible force is keeping you in.

Like it or not, you're stuck playing this game. Now that you've started it, you can't stop, and thus you have to decide what to do next. But what should you do?
11112112.title: Check out the restaurant.

choices: Prepare yourself, check out a consumables vendor
111121122.content:
You slowly move your way back to the bed, your big gut threatening to topple you. Sitting down your gut sits heavy on your legs, and you rest the controller on it as you resume play.

Your hero walks much the same way you did before, and you waddle around the town looking for what to do next. You see shops, more food places, and homes all encased in the sanctuary of a walled in town.

With your hunger bar more than full you are left now to explore more of this game.
111121122.title: Keep playing the game and figure out something ...

1111211222.content:
You move your character to the job board and look at which freelance jobs are available. The game thankfully shows the the level requirement for certain quests, and thus only a few are available. You figure you should start something basic than advanced until you understand how the game works more so you don't end up adding more to your frame than needed.

The first job: "I need someone to come sort out my warehouse. Literally sort it, the whole place is a mess. [Requires: level 1 - Rewards: 300g + 1000 xp]

Second job: "Civilian Guard Duty: Join the patrol around the town and protect the innocent from monsters and crime. [Requires: lv 1, suggested lv 2 - rewards 500g + 2000xp + skill bonus]
1111211222.title: Check the job board

choices: A slime oozing out of the gutter!
11112112222.content:
With the promise of a greater reward, you accept the second job, and a navigator on your screen displays the direction you should go. It's not too far a walk, and you find it odd that none of the NPCs comment on the obscenely large gut protruding from your hero. In fact, a couple had dialogue that said you looked thin! You make it to the guard quarters and walk in.

At a desk is a man writing on papers, as you approach he looks up from them and says, "Can I help you citizen?". You scroll through the list of dialogue options to the one asking about working as a temporary guard. "Ah, finally someone with the nerves to protect this place." He turns and opens a chest then pulls out some gear with the crest of the kingdom on it. "Here, go change into these then come see me so I can put you to work." he turns back to his papers.

You open your inventory screen and it shows all you have. Your basic clothes are currently equip, and you see your hero standing on the right with his gut poking out. You highlight and select the guard uniform, the game loads and your character now has his guard outfit and his gut poking out from under the chainmail largely still.

Returning to the game, you speak to the guard, "Much better. Don't worry about the fit, you'll grow into it." In reality you rub your gut and look at your in game hero in non-belief that they don't think he looks off. "Right then, you're on rounds today. Go on then, and be on your guard for anything."

You walk through the streets, somewhat aimlessly due to you not knowing exactly what to do as this quest doesn't have much detail other than just wander the street. NPC dialogue pretty normal, though every now and then someone comments on you being "too skinny" for a guard. This continues for a few minuets of real life time, though for the in game time it was a few hours and your hunger bar had gone down slightly tho it doesn't look like it or feel like it you gaze at your gut as it looks the same as before.

As if on que when you wonder if you're doing it right, a commotion occurs around the corner. You sprint, your gut bouncing wildly, as you round the corner to find...
11112112222.title: The Guards

choices: Back to the guard house for your reward
Divert! This is an open world rpg after all.
111121122221.content:
You run around the corner and find a green slime oozing from the sewer! A fight! And then it hits you... you don't know how to fight it! Your gaming instincts kick in and you press everything on the controller until something happens. It seems to work as you quickly draw your weapon and raise it against the beast. The UI adjusts to take in the new foe, showing a health meter, and a name; Jelly green slime. You raise your shield and approach and wait for a blow to be made and a good thing too.

The battle ensues with the slime spraying itself hard at your head, but with your shield raised it does little damage. Once it looks like it's died down, you lower your shield and raise your weapon to attack. The blow lands, but... the meter remains the same! You try again and the same, no progress. Is this unbeatable? Is it out of my level range? No... the quest said it only needed lv 1... Then you realize, slimes just take blows! You'd need magic or an enchanted weapon to actually hurt this thing!

You raise your shield to defend, and it works temporarily. Eventually you loose your ground and stagger, your health meter going down slightly. Then the slime steers itself again and shoots itself again, at your face; or more specifically, your mouth. Your hero staggers again then falls back on his ass, and in real life you feel as though a hose is being placed in your mouth and it's pouring down your throat and filling your belly. "Damn, again?!" you think in real life.

The slime relentlessly continues it's focused stream into your hero's belly, his hunger meter gradually filling, along with his belly. It begins to to fill the space between his legs, and the same begins to happen to you. You lean back on the bed giving your gut more room to grow, it flows down your legs and begins to blow beyond your knees. Soon your vision is obstructed by your belly as it grows larger and larger, your shirt now becoming a bra more than anything. Soon it stops.

You stand upright, nearly falling forward as your new larger gut hangs lower to the ground; just past your knees and sticks out at least 5 feet. It has a firmness to it to show that it's vastly full, however, it also is soft like jelly; rippling and jiggling at the slightest touch or movement. Your hero looks much the same as you. Suddenly the belly on your hero starts comically shaking, and the screen starts to shake, and you feel something else in your gut. Soon the shaking is violent and you feel it having an effect on your body. Simultaneously with the game, the loudest burp you've ever done emerges; it lasts 15 seconds but is deep, unbelievably loud, and actually hurt at one point. After you've settled that down, you place a hand on your gut and look back at the screen and see new dialogue "Quest complete!"

You walk towards the door, you gut swinging heavily and even gaining momentum. You try the door, and find it's still locked. Back to the game. Something catches your eye as you walk back to the bed. A mirror. You see yourself in full belly glory. You take a long stare at your new figure, as it jiggles and sloshes around. And you realize... you kind of like it... You think this game might be fun for you in the long run. You make your way back to the game, taking the controller back to the headboard and lay on your belly, your legs hanging in the air and your knees digging into the jelly filled gut. You resume play and head...
111121122221.title: A slime oozing out of the gutter!

choices: a man about your Uncle's age...
111122.content:
You notice a controller by the bed, and turn on the Xbox. But, after going through the library of titles, you decide to get up and explore the mansion - you're a bit restless, and curious...

The hallways are generous, and there's a skylight every so often. Most of the doors are locked - and the ones that are aren't, the doors stand open and invite you in. There's a lounge of some sort, with easy chairs and a coffee station, a bar and a great view of a huge outdoor pool - now there's something you'll be using! Another room is a sort of mini-movie theatre, a third a small gym, and then you get to a flight of stairs. There's an elevator beside it, and before you can head down the stairs, the door opens and out comes...
111122.title: Elsewhere in the Mansion...

1111221.content:
As you explore, you come to a flight of stairs. There's an elevator beside it, and before you can head down the stairs, the door opens and out comes another guy your age.

"You must be Eric!" the other guy says, smiling. "Geoff told me to look for you, and see if you wanted to work out or go for a swim."

"Well, I... a swim would be good," says Eric, recovering from the shock of this guy knowing his name, and also the new guy's size. Like Uncle Geoff, he must be 6'7", and ...
1111221.title: Meet Eugene

11112212.content:
He was absolutely HUGE!! His arms and legs showed definition of muscle and strength even though they were covered in a fairly thick layer of fat. His Chest was huge with huge moobs that would appear firm with muscle along with his huge drooping gut, the only clothing to cover his slightly hairy body was a pair of tight trunks which showed off more of his size. Though whilst Eric looked at the huge guy, we was suddenly awaken b a thick voice.

"Earth to Eric, you there?" The guy in front on him said, though his thick voice seemed to shake the fat on his face and thick neck.

"Oh yeah I'm just ummm, wondering how do you know my name, cause to be honest I don't really know you." Eric said trying not to be distracted by the big guy.

The big guy chuckled deeply, causing his fat to jiggle wildly and he then said, "Yeah, well I have seen you in a while and I put on a lot of weight since we last met but I get it, it's me, David your....
11112212.title: absolutely HUGE!

choices: every summer since I've come back to put on more...
I never left after that first summer....
I was state sumo champion the next year!
111122121.content:
"Earth to Eric, you there?" the huge guy in front of Eric said. As he spoke, his rich, deep voice seemed to shake the fat on his face and thick neck.

"Oh, yeah, I'm just, ummm, wondering how do you know my name, 'cause to be honest I don't really know you," Eric said, trying not to be distracted by the big guy's awesome, huge presence.

The big guy chuckled deeply, causing various parts of his fat to jiggle wildly, and he then said, "Yeah, well, I haven't seen you in a while and I put on a lot of weight since we last met, but I get it, it's me, David your cousin."

"Cousin David? No way!" Eric replied. "You've gone huge! What happened?"

"Well, three summers ago I got an invitation to come stay with Uncle Geoff for the summer, and he helped me put on some weight."

"Some weight? You're huge!"

"Yeah, I know, and ...
111122121.title: Follow in Cousin Dave's substantial footsteps?

choices: heard what you've been talking about?
been expecting to see you swimming?
1111221211.content:
"Some weight? You're huge!" Eric exclaims.

"Yeah, I know, and every summer since I've come back to put on more!" cousin David replies positively.

"But why? Why'd you want to be so big?"

"Well, the first summer it was for football - I wanted to be a lineman, and I was having trouble gaining weight - Uncle Geoff helped me realise I wasn't eating enough to pack on much weight, I was starving my muscles. The second year, well - I just wanted to be the biggest lineman, and I'd started powerlifting, and I wanted to be stronger. That year I gave up football after we won the championships, for a new sport - 'cause I was still gaining through the season, just couldn't stop eating - I needed something other than powerlifting, where more weight was good - and that's when the sumo team recruited me. But you know, for sumo, more weight is always better, so I came back a third summer to get 'sumo-sized', and this year, well...."

"Even bigger for sumo?"

"Yeah!" David responded positively. "Plus I'm still powerlifting, and Uncle Geoff told me you'd be coming."

"But I'm not planning on gaining like you!"

"But you are planning on working out and getting stronger, right?"

"Well, yeah."

"Geoff can help you with that too. I bet, like me, you aren't eating enough."

"Really? I've got good guns, just want to be stronger."

As the two of your have talked, you've been walking along, and as you approach an open door, Uncle Geoff appears. Has he
1111221211.title: every summer since I've come back to put on...

11112212112.content:
As you and Eugene have talked, you've been walking along, and as you approach an open door, Uncle Geoff appears.

"I thought you'd be in the pool by now?" he asks, looking you up and down. "I see Eugene is ready."

"I was just exploring a little when I met Eugene," you hastily explain. "I saw the pool, but I have to go back to my room for trunks."

"Oh, just head on down to the pool, there's lots of guest trunks down there, in lots of sizes - I like to encourage my visitors to swim," Uncle Geoff remarked. "If you head down now, I think I might join you. Afterwards we might look at the weight deck."

"Weight deck?" you ask.

"Yeah, there's an outdoor one by the pool," Eugene notes, "as well as one in the house. Uncle is all set up for us guys who want to get stronger."

"I'll say," you reply, impressed.

"There's an outdoor sumo ring and football practice gear too," Geoff notes. "See you soon." Your uncle sets his huge body in motion once again, and you're once again impressed at how effortlessly he seems to move, despite his vast size. Each step drives ripples and mini-quakes through your uncle's abundant flesh.

"C'mon, the water's great!" says Eugene, striding out ahead of you - and he, too, moves with the sort of effortless grace you don't associate with guys so big. But at least in Eugene, the muscling under the fat padding is pretty obvious ...

At the pool,
11112212112.title: Uncle Geoff is encouraging

choices: End of the summer, Eric's Mom comes to pick him up and is shocked
111122122.content:
...Uncle's partner silly!" Eric scanned his memory for a moment trying to register who this man was, when suddenly he was hit with flashbacks of a man with uncle Geoff every time he came to visit, what was strange about these flashbacks though was that David seemed to get fatter every time Eric saw him. Eric had never seen him this big he estimated his weight to be around 450-500lb.

"look at you Little Duck! (David's pet name for Eric) you look so big and strong just look at these muscles!" David got closer to Eric and started squeezing his arms, Eric thought this was kind of weird and pervy but he knew he would be staying with David for the next while so he didn't want to upset him by brushing him away. "you know I used to be something of an athlete myself until I met your uncle that is!" David giggled as he said this slapping his gelatinous paunch. "Smedley!" boomed David at the top of his lungs while clapping his sausage like hands together, a rather old and enormous butler in a tuxedo came plodding through the door. Eric thought he looked liked a wrecking ball with arms and legs. "yes sir?" Smedley said between huffing and puffing desperately trying to catch his breath "I want you to go fetch the the special burger Geoff made for Eric earlier please" "certainly master David" with that Smedley scuttled off as he did this Eric noticed the fabric of his tight butlers trousers getting bunched up between his gigantic jiggling ass cheeks, Eric saw this and almost gagged "how could these people let themselves go like this? it's disgusting" Eric though to himself. "you don't have to get me food David I ate before I came here" Eric breathed out with a sigh of exasperation, " oh nonsense little duck! you have to try Geoff's cooking! I think you'll find it most agreeable!" David chuckled as he slapped his belly again sending waves through it "also little duck call me Uncle, David seems so well..formal!" Before Eric could respond Smedley came in with with a cart sweating and panting from overexertion. "Here we are! Bon appetit "little" Duck" David said with a devilish grin. Eric took a look at the burger the meat looked almost raw and it was oozing some kind of pink slime like substance. "Uncle I really don't think I wanna-" "Eric you are living in my house for the summer and while here you will obey my rules now eat!" Eric felt a sudden urge to do what David told him to and instantly sat down and dug in. The burger was the best thing Eric had ever eaten it felt like he was having an orgasm in his mouth he had to have more! David shot an approving glance at Smedley who then ran off to get more food. over the span of the next few hours Eric ate himself into a stupor and passed out on the dining room table. David carried him to his room "It's going to be easier than I thought to turn you into our fat obedient son, you're going to look so cute when your big and fat!" David thought as he lay Eric down on his bed, he couldn't contain himself his excitement overflowing, but he had to remain in check if he was going to dupe Eric into becoming a permanent member of the family....
111122122.title: Uncle (Geoff's partner)

choices: Try and take Eric back with her and mend the damage
Leave him with his uncle's where he belongs
1111221222.content:
It's the end of summer vacation and Eric's mother and David are sitting down to a nice cup of tea he tells her how 'well behaved' Eric's been over the summer months and how well he's 'adjusted' to living with him and Geoff.

Eric's mother tells David it's been great catching up but she and Eric should really get back to Eric's father who's looking forward to seeing him.

"Certainly" David replies with a devilish grin, " oh Ducky!" He calls up the staircase. What comes bounding down said staircase is not the son that Eric's mother remembered raising, with a confident strut any confident young sassy girl would be proud of all 425lbs of Eric came swaying his massive hips into the room. The son that Eric's mother remembered dropping off to the mansion was attractive and buff, but the boy that stood in front of her in her mind was neither. Formerly tanned Eric was now pale as a sheet, his buzz cut gone in favour of a bleach blonde bowl cut that David thought was far more trendy also his sporty style was a thing of the past he now wore a baby blue outfit sandals, polo and a pair of speedos all to small for him. The speedos did little to hide his burgeoning ass mushy and huge from all the stuffing and sitting he had done over summer, his belly big and round with several rolls his polo t-shirt clinging to it like a second skin his navel poking out the bottom. Eric's moobs were slightly smaller than David's but completely dwarfed his mothers being huge gelatinous orbs that rested atop his mountainous belly.

As Eric's mother eyed him up and down she noted the rest of his appearance thunder thighs that met in the middle,kankles, bingo wings that Eric's granny would be proud of, and a row of chins that started moving as he spoke "hi mommy dearest" sounding a lot more camp than she remembered.

What was she to do blame David and Geoff for what they've done her to son or disown the fat pale effeminate creature they had turned him into?
1111221222.title: End of the summer, Eric's Mom comes to pick...

11112212222.content:
David sat there, holding his tongue. He thought he knew what was about to come. The tea he had given her would surely work.

"YOU ARE NOT MY SON!" She lashed out as she banged her teacup to its saucer. She then grabbed her purse and let.

"Mommy," moaned Eric. He tried to waddle to catch her, but between his new weight and the flip flops, he soon gave up.

"I'm sorry, Little Duck," said David. "Why don't we have Smedley fetch you something from the kitchen? While your mother might not love you anymore, know that your uncle and I will always be here for here, like a son."



Eric was soon at the dinning room table, working his way through a fest.

"Little Duck, now that you are staying here full-time, let's talk about what your duties are."

"Duties?" Eric said looking up from a pie.

"Yes, everyone here has a job and yours will be as one of..."
11112212222.title: Bewitching the Mother

choices: All 650lbs of Uncle Geoff eyeing them up seductively
Smedley in black leather trunks and a whip with tassels to put manners on Eric
111122122221.content:
Eric was shocked, he had always had a thing for David but he knew that because of his relationship with his Uncle that he would never get a chance to get what he wanted.

"Uncle, I had no idea you wanted me like that!" Eric breathed between mouthfuls of blueberry pie, his already rosy cheeks blushing with boyish embarrassment. 1222222.content:
"What do you mean by huge?" you ask, curiously.

"Well..." Daniel pauses, thinking. "You know how the servants are all obese, like from around three to six hundred pounds?"

"Wait... there are servants here who weigh 600?" you can't help but asking.

"Well, it's only one... technically he's supposed to be a servant, but all he does is sit in the servant's quarters and get stuffed by the other servants all day. Supposedly the stuffing had started out as some kind of initiation, but I guess they liked it so much that they kept going. At first he resisted, and tried to leave to do some work, but the others just kept him there. Eventually, he just stopped resisting. Actually, he's even begun to enjoy it. It didn't take long for him to become a leader figure for the other servants. Now whatever he asks them, they go and do. Mainly he just asks for food. All things considered, it's no wonder he's gotten so much bigger than the other servants... I'd say they just enjoy being able to see him get so dang fat. He's been bursting out of his clothes since it started. Could you imagine that when he first got here, he was around the same size as you are now?"

You think for a while about how someone as thin as you could get so big only after staying here as a servant. How could someone get that fat just from being stuffed? you think.

"Anyway, his name is Terrence," says Daniel. "As you could guess, he's pretty popular around here."

"...So what about those two fat guys who don't swim often?" you ask.

"Oh, right, right. They're huge! They'd been staying here initially because they used to be a luchador team who was training up their weight to become better fighters in the ring. I say "used to" because they enjoyed your uncle's food so much, they never wanted to leave. So they're now retired. They still hold regular "matches" against each other, but they're too fat now to ever go back to professional masked wrestling."

"So, how big are they?" you wonder.

"You'll be surprised when you hear this, but Rodriguez is about 1,300 lbs, while his partner, Antonio, is pushing 1,400!"

"What?!" you exclaim.

Daniel chuckles in response. "I suppose that's a pretty normal reaction. They could be documented as the world's fattest masked wrestling duo, but they're not really in it for the publicity. You would also probably be surprised to hear that even fatter people have lived within these walls."

You just stand there, mouth agape. You finally snap out of it, and ask another question. "But... how do they have matches? Aren't they too big to move?"

"They would be," replies Daniel, "but your Uncle has created a rope-and-pulley system over their ring that helps them support their fat. He's even had seamstresses make them these gigantic wrestling costumes to fit their massive bodies. Their weekly matches are pretty impressive. They even have an excuse to gain weight for it, since they need to compete in both weight and strength."

"When's their next match?"

"Tomorrow night. If you want to see them now, then that's fine too."

You nod, and then pause for a second to think. How awesome would it be if you could get stuffed to oblivion like Terrence, or if you could train with the two immobile masked wrestlers, maybe even get massive enough to become a third opponent. Even though it feels weird to you that you're having these thoughts, somehow it feels right.

You sigh, calming yourself down. You hate to admit it, but you were getting a little aroused there. You then turn to Daniel.

"So, Daniel..." you say...

The next day, you're sitting among the rest of the residents in the rec room, which, according to Daniel, Geoff had converted into a "wrestling room" a long time ago. A gigantic ring stands in the center of the room, much, much bigger than any other wrestling ring you have seen. Also around the room are various weights, all lined up at the back end of the room. Antonio's rear is pretty huge too, and although it isn't as full and large as his bottom-heavy opponent's, it's still fairly formidable in its size.

153.title: A big guy in a suit - who?

choices: Family photos and Uncle Geoff's growth through the ages?   or
Photos of fat guests who have stayed here, all of them are fat?  or
154.content:
You pass the big shirtless guy and see a man wearing the biggest pair of white shorts and a light pink polo shirt you've ever seen. The man is massive. His legs must be as thick a tree trunks. His body is wide and soft looking, you can see that the massive pink shirt covers a massive gut.
"Eric!" says the massive man and he waddles on over with his arms stretched out. You're a little nervous he's going to run you over but stops in time and wraps his arms around you and gives you a strong bear hug against his belly, lifting you off the ground in the process. You can't even reach all the way around him.
"Uncle Geoff," you say uneasily.
"I haven't seen you in ages," Uncle Geoff says putting you down and places his giant meaty paws on your shoulders," Let me get a good look at you."
You stand still, and take in just how much bigger your uncle is. By your guess he's 6'5" and is probably twice as wide as you.
"You look just like your father when he was your age," Uncle Geoff says with a smile," same hair, same boney body, same eyes."
"Thanks," you smile," I guess."
"Well my house is your house now, so make yourself comfortable. Jimmy here will show you the way to your room," Geoff says and the shirtless door keeper walks over," I have to go make an important phone call."
You nod and follow Jimmy to the stairs as your uncle scurries away to a different part of the house.

As you walk down the hallway you see... What?
154.title: An Even Bigger Man

choices: a suite decorated in Medieval style!
1542.content:
Eric nods to his uncle as Geoff pushes off one way, then follow Jimmy to the stairs. Despite his size, Jimmy sets a good pace up the stairs, which curl around to the left to an upper balcony that surrounds the massive entrance hall. Eric has no trouble keeping up, despite hauling his bags, but Jimmy moves faster than his size had led Eric to expect.

As Eric follows Jimmy along the balcony, then down a hallway Jimmy says, "So you're Geoff's nephew? Geoff's mentioned you, but you never came to visit, so I didn't know if there was some problem - I do know that he's very glad to have you here. You're probably wondering why I'm wearing this odd get-up? Your uncle and I are into RenFairs, Creative Anachronism, all the Medieval stuff, and I was just trying on this costume for a RenFair next month when you got to the door. The sword is real, and I made the pants myself - I've outgrown the last ones!"

On the walls of the hallway are photos, some of them quite large, of folks in Medieval costumes like Jimmy's, and other odd clothing. "Who's all these people on the walls?" Eric asks, puzzled because all of them seem to be fat - and some of the clothes are just strange.

"Oh, those are all people who've stayed here for RenFair, or for cosplay - Geoff always take photos, and puts up the best one, the biggest ones, the best costumes...do you cosplay?"

The biggest ones is certainly accurate, Eric reflects as he sees some truly large folks in the photos! "No, I don't cosplay, but I'd like to try," he replies. He thinks that this might be something new to try this summer - and he'll try anything that will keep him away from his bitterly bickering parents.

"Good, we'll have some fun this summer," Jimmy enthuses. "Be good to have some young blood around the place too. Here's your room - there's a phone, just pick it up and press '1' if you need anything, it'll call my cell. Lunch is in an hour - settle in, explore if you like, then come downstairs to the dining room for 12 noon sharp! We play a gong five minutes before."

And with that, Jimmy shifted his substantial self away back down the hallway, leaving Eric in the doorway to ...
1542.title: House decorations?

info.brief_description: Eric has to live with his strange uncle for the summer
info.description:
Erics parents are in the middle of a divorce. It's been a long time coming, but the stress is getting to him. So on his last summer vacation before he transfers out of state for college, his family sends him to live with his mothers brother. Uncle Geoff. The family doesn't talk about him much, and whenever he showed up to family gatherings and events his parents quickly shooed him away. All Eric knew about him, was that he was obscenely rich, and excessively eccentric. Eric is going to find out just what his family means by eccentric, and he might even join in on the fun.

Eric is 5'11, has blonde hair he keeps buzzed, and is in great shape due to his time on his high schools swim team. He's toned and fit, and prides himself on his good body. He can come off as cocky, but he's genuinely interested by the people around him. And is eager to connect with his uncle he's never really known.

Uncle Geoff is a strange character for sure. Depending on the chosen path, he has multiple interests, and multiple intentions. Some of them quite sinister. He is bound to make a huge impact on Eric's life during his stay at his home.

This is a weight gain story, where you can use any means to fatten up our characters. Magic, science fiction, forced feeding, kidnapping, natural weight gain, sabotage, anything you can think of. Sex is all right, gay sex is preferred, but I will make no judgements. I will also be straightening up some sections, adjusting them to read cleaner, or expanding on certain scenarios. If you add chapters, please try to be detailed and a certain amount of depth to the reading. Enjoy the story folks.
